US-B67EDA8E.title: Progress Bar During Extension Operation
US-B67EDA8E.description: As a user, I want to see a progress bar during operation of the extension, so that I can understand the status and progress of ongoing operations
US-B67EDA8E.i_want: to see a progress bar during operation of the extension
US-B67EDA8E.so_that: I can understand the status and progress of ongoing operations
acceptance_criteria: Progress bar appears when extension starts processing
Progress bar displays current operation status
Progress bar disappears when operation completes
